body:
Hi all,

So this is just a little game i made up. The way it works is that 1 person will start by saying the most extreme thing they've done like skydiving or something then the next person rates the last persons extreme thing on a scale of 1 to 10 and then says there's and then the game goes on :)

I will start, Wing suit flown of a plane

Hope u enjoy the game :D
body_tagged:

I will start, Wing suit flown of a plane

Hope u enjoy the game :D
title: Extreme Experience GAME!!
